review: Good little connector cable.  Well constructed, durable, built to last.  I would recommend this cable to connect stomp boxes. Worth it.
The One Spot is a great way to supply power to all your stomp boxes without a bulky power supply or a bunch of wall warts.  Get it, you won't be sorry.

Works great.  For the money you can't go wrong with this effect.  I'm using it more then I thought I would when I first bought it.  The only thing I don't really care for is the stomp switch which is activated with more on a touch then a click.  Seems like it may be a weak point of the pedal but so far it's held up fine.
Works well, has many options of reverb and tweaks on all the options.  I would recommend this pedal for an inexpensive reverb.
Sounds great, easy to adjust.  Nice shape to help fit it on a compact pedal board. Worth price hands down.
Easy to use and only takes up one space on a power strip. Recommended.  Well worth the price of the product.
